question.text: Which of the following products of genetic engineering are not correctly matched with their use?

options.text: Tissue Plasminogen Activator: Breaks blood clot
Enzyme DNAse: Helps in cell division and repair of tissues
Humulin: To treat insulin dependent diabetes

solution.text:
Some products of genetic engineering and their uses
 
No Name of the gene/Product Use
1. Tissue Plasminogen Activator (TPA) Used to prevent or reverse blood clots
2. Human Growth hormone producer gene To treat pituitary dwarfism
3. Tissue Growth Factor Beta (TGF-B) Promotes new blood vessels and epiderminal growth. Useful in wound healing and burns.
4. Human Blood Clotting Factor – VIII To treat haemophilia
5. Human Insulin (Humulin) To treat insulin dependent diabetes
6. Enzyme DNAse To treat cystic fibrosis
7. Bovine Growth Hormone To increase cattle yield
8. Recombinant Vaccines For prophylaxis of human & animal viral diseases eg. Hepatitis B
9. Genetically engineered bacteria and other microbes For improved production of industrial enzymes, citric acid& ethanol.
10. Genetically engineered bacteria Can accelerate the degradation of Oil pollutants or certain chemicals in toxic wastes.
